Title: My Oldest Daughter
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (creator), Nancy M. Pimental
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Fiona is involved in a road rage incident that damages a company car and leads her to tell a lie about how it happened. Meanwhile, Lip struggles in school and with the ladies.
